body:
@bradfitz 

I think it's the ```,string``` option
since it has ```,string``` option, it should unquoteBytes(https://github.com/golang/go/blob/853f1a1a63b759686421196d419ddaa626a44bf5/src/encoding/json/decode.go#L1071)
